extension.description: In this wizard you will find the latest Fire build....Without work from the Devs this would not of been possible! Thanks Dan Elmore for creating the first kodi Wizard, to TVADDONS.AG, whufclee@ TotalXBMC,GUYS @ TI, MuckyDuck, ][NT3L][G3NC][ for the app installer and all Developers who created add-ons used in my build. Also a very special Thanks to whufclee for the original Community Builds code used in this add-on. Visit https://www.facebook.com/groups/Firetvguru for more info and support.
extension.disclaimer: I do not host nor control the content found within!!!!!

extension.summary: [COLOR red]LAST MAINTENANCE TOOL Y'All WILL EVER NEED!!![/COLOR]
extension.description: Does all the Maint needed for a smooth kodi with out all the fluff. Features Auto Cache delete at every start up, notifies you when package and thumbs get full (Sizes are changable) cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Also has tons of Backup/Restore Options and a Speed test, plus other great features!! THX goes to surfacingx and TDB for the code used
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Fitness and Workout content. All the content provided is copyrighted to the repectfull owners on YouTube.

extension.news: - Added MPEG-DASH support for Kodi 17 w/ inputstream.mpd Add-on - Added optional History and Watch Later custom playlist to Settings -> Folders, or (My)Playlists context menu to set/remove - Added Maintenance section to Settings - Added 'Subtitle language(s) to download' selection to Settings -> General - API key set switching from Settings -> API (this will log you out) - Dual login only required if My Subscriptions folder is enabled at sign-in - API Tweaking and Various other Updates
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es un uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
